notes: Son of No-one, Warpriest of Talos, Wyvern Rider of Nightspire. Alignment: Neutral Evil. Classes: Bloodrager (Barbarian Sorcerer) / 4, Cavalier / 2, Warpriest / 3. Specializations: Order of the Wyvern - Beast Rider, Savage Elf Ancestry, Barbarian Heritage. Race: Half-Elven. Deity: Talos, Warlord of Storms. Homeland: Icewind Dale. Faction: City of Nightspire. Stats: STR 20, DEX 14, CON 19, INT 16, WIS 20, CHA 16, Size: Medium, Height: 6'4", Weight: 235 lbs, Age: 28, Gender: Male, Eyes: Hazel, Hair: Brown. Vitals: HP 74, Immune to rust effects and magical sleep effects. Special feats: Improved Initiative, Dodge, Mounted Combat, Ride-By-Attack, Death From Above, Raging Vitality, Calvary Formation, Skill Focus (Craft: Armor), Hero's Fortune, Endurance, Weapon Focus (Battleaxe / Greataxe), Eschew Materials, Skill Focus (Survival), Arisen. Campaign specifics: Hero Points: 2, Conflict Points: 12, Total Fame: 12, Prestige: 12, Honor: 31
